short_summary: Renewal of SAP for Sybase support and maintenance
description: The Shared Services Canada is renewing the SAP for Sybase support and maintenance. The successful bidder will be the one that can provide the best support and maintenance services. The contract is worth
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP)
##Title#
**SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance Renewal**
### Details
* Reference Number: SSC-24-00026262:T
* Solicitation Number: BPM021152/26262
* Publication Date: 2024-04-05
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-17 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

### Description
The Shared Services Canada requires a vendor to provide SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) as part of the renewal process for the period of April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025. All bids must be submitted through the Public Services and Procurement Canada’s (PSPC) Procurement Portal (P2P) by the specified deadline.

### Requirements
* The bidder must be registered with PSPC's online procurement system and have a valid profile.
* All bids must be submitted in electronic format through the P2P portal.
* Bidders must comply with the mandatory requirements outlined in the solicitation document.
* After the solicitation closing, the P2P system will not permit bidders to submit any additional bids.

### Eligibility
* Bidders must meet the criteria outlined in the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) tax and regulatory requirements.
* Bidders must also meet the requirements specified in the UN SC SP 3510 Agreement.
* Local businesses only: Bidders must have a valid business location within Ontario.

### Access to the Solicitation Document
The solicitation document can be accessed through PSPC’s e-buy (eB) portal.

## Contact Details
* For any questions or inquiries, please contact Sandra Ladouceur at 613-302-0766 or 613-960-6026 (fax).
* For general information, kindly visit PSPC’s official website https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Documents
* Solicitation Document
* Appendices and supporting documents can be downloaded from PSPC's e-buy (eB) portal.

---
